location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 1529/47 'Air travel to Persian Gulf by officers on the Political Resident's staff'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the inside front cover with 1, and terminates at the last folio with 43; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains letters and paperwork relating to the arrangement of air passage from London to the Persian Gulf by the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf during 1947. The tickets were booked on British Overseas Airlines Corporation, and were done so for a variety of British Agency Staff, primarily in Bahrain.
